    Mayapuri Contest
Joinfilms is starting a contest in association with Mayapuri (Hindi: मायापुरी) where first 10 winners win the latest issue of Mayapuri Magazine. The contest will run for two weeks.How old is Mayapuri Magazine in India?1.    302.    403.    204.    50Mayapuri is a most read film-gossip weekly in northern Hindi belt of India. It is the oldest and only circulated Hindi film weekly of India, with a distribution figure of over 3,40,000 per week and a readership of 30,60,000.First published in 1974 by Mayapuri Group, some of the old issues of decades of 1970–...

    Shaadi Ke Side Effects
Directed by Saket Chaudhary, ‘Shaadi ke side effects’ is a comedy movie, starring ‘Bhaag Milkha Bhaag' fame Farhan Akhtar and talented actress Vidya Balan in lead roles. The film is about an urban working couple, of which the husband yearns to have the life of a single man even after marriage and in between so they experience many comic situations and how they cop up with these situations. Both actors have extensively promoted the film and still busy promoting the film on various platforms. The film is a sequel of 2006 hit film 'Pyaar Ke Side Effects’ and is slated to release on February...
    Highway Contest
‘Jab We Met’ director Imtiaz Ali has directed ‘Highway’, which stars Alia Bhatt and Randeep Hooda as main protagonists of the film. The film will hit theatres next Friday (February 21).The most interesting thing about this film is that Imtiaz Ali has shot the entire film without having a proper script and the dialogues were decided on the spot. In Imtiaz words “The film is about the discovery of yourself while traveling. It’s a coming-of-age movie.”The film has been shot across six states in a truck. Music is composed by acclaimed music composer AR Rahman. Recently the first show of '...
    Gunday Contest
Our this week contest is from film ‘Gunday’, which hits screen on February 14. Gunday is written and directed Ali Abbas Zafar and produced by Yash Raj Film. Ranveer Singh and Arjun Kapoor are main protagonists of this film while Priyanka Chopra is lead actress and love interest of male actors and Irrfan Khan is playing a cop role.The film, set in the 1970s, is about Bikram (Ranveer Singh) and Bala (Arjun Kapoor), who live on the wrong side of the law, becoming gun carriers and coal bandits.The film is mainly shot in Mumbai at Yash Raj Studios followed by Kolkata and some in Durgapur district...

The upcoming romedy film “Hasee Toh Phasee”, featuring Sidharth Malhota and Parineeti Chopra for the first time on the silver screen, is scheduled to release on February 7. Win 25 free movie tickets every week! And that too without scratching your heads. All you have to do is to tell the name of the Bollywood diva Madhuri Dixit’s character name in her upcoming movie ‘Dedh Ishqiya’.To make the contest easy, we are also giving four options to choose from. Begum MuniyaWe will announce the names of the 25 lucky winners on January 16, 2014. So start sending your answers and keep winning free tickets.
